LACOSTE JERSEY SUPIMA SWEATER A classic, lightweight cotton V-neck in a green that doesn't scream ''Kiss me, I'm Irish!'' $135. lacoste.com.
J LINDEBERG CLASSIC GOLF SHOE BY PUMA Two great brands join in this retro design worn by PGA Tour style maven Jesper Parnevik. $250. jlindeberg.com.
TAG HEUER PROFESSIONAL GOLF WATCH Golfer-friendly with a rubber strap and a buckle and crown that don't get in the way. $1,395. tagheuer.com.
J. CREW MADRAS FLAT CAPS Available in hand-cut Indian cotton (two at left) or classic cotton plaid (right). $38 and $34. jcrew.com.
RLX RALPH LAUREN CLUB II VEST AND POLO A ripstop nylon vest keeps wind and rain from mussing your stylish striped shirt. $165 and $85. polo.com.
ROSASEN ARMSTRONG SHORTS Cotton argyle shorts cool enough to wear on or off the course. $90. rosasen.com.
BURBERRY GOLF VISOR Visors can be dorky. Not this one from Burberry, in trademark black-and-rust plaid. $65. burberry.com.
HUGO BOSS GREEN TROUSERS Don't let the color fool you; these are not your grandfather's cotton golf pants. $145. hugoboss.com.
BROOKS BROTHERS COUNTRY CLUB GOLF BELT Ingeniously simple: your divot-repair tool slides out of the buckle. $98. brooksbrothers.com.
